abstract.p: This short text is a commentary on chapter 76 of the Book of Enoch. It is attested as part of . The commentary contains a slightly adapted text of chapter 76 on the winds and a summary of the content, which groups the winds according to their characteristics.

div.note: This part follows chapter 76 of the Book of Enoch with some minor deviations and omissions.
